value:
I have long lived in the desert.
Places like this? They're
unfamiliar to me.

You possess summoning magic.
Careful. Such immense power can,
over time, drive a man mad.

I am grateful for what you do.
That is all.

I know you are no warrior, but the
way you direct us in battle? You're
like a beast. Ferocious.

The path of the Desert Guardian is
a lonely one. And by necessity. So
forgive me if I stand at a remove.

Are you $Nu?$k$pI've come bearing a hello from a
distant place from your friend
$Nf.
WUU-OOHHH!
My strength has gone up. Good.

Is...my time as guardian coming
to an end?

I am grateful for what you have
given me.

I am the Desert Guardian—he who
defends the dunes around the
village of dragons I call home.$k$pBut you, stranger, can call me
Hawkeye.

It is time for us to have words
of weight. You and I, now.$k$pI sense that you find me strange.
Perhaps even stranger than
most people here find me.$k$pI am from the deep desert, and those
from outside it see me as
outside themselves.$k$pDo you feel the same? About me?
Or more importantly, about
yourself?$k$pYou and I are the same in one
regard. We both want to ensure
that peace persists.$k$pLike the sands of time, which flow
but never change, you and I will
always be there for the world.
むんっ！
ふんっ！
うああっ！
むぅっ…！
WUU-OOHHH!
FIGHT!
I know NOTHING of fear!
I'm coming for YOU.
...Home...
Huh.
If you need to talk, I am always here.
You wish to get my attention? Friend, you have it.
I have a destiny. I will fulfill it.
The desert I guard... There is no desert more in need of a guardian.
I find you...mysterious.
My time as guardian will come to an end. That time draws near.
I believe in you, friend.
Hmm.
Yes?
Of course.
